trans-unit.source: 1.0.8 (unreleased)
A batch defined in plone.batching usually consists of two things:
trans-unit.target: 一个在plone.batching中定义的批处理通常由两部分组成。

trans-unit.source: A batch is instantiated like this:
trans-unit.target: 一个批次是这样实例化的。

trans-unit.source: A batch object. This is usually a wrapper for a sequence, which provides slices of information.
trans-unit.target: 一个批处理对象。这通常是一个序列的包装器,它提供了信息的切片。

trans-unit.source: A batch view. This is needed for display. It contains links to navigate to the slices defined in 1.
trans-unit.target: 一个批次的视图。这是需要显示的。它包含导航到1中定义的切片的链接。

trans-unit.source: Added missing Zope2 dependency. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 添加了缺少的Zope2依赖关系。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Allow orphan size to be equal to batch size. This allows the edge case of batch size 0 with default orphan size 0. [do3cc]
trans-unit.target: 允许孤儿大小等于批次大小。这允许批处理大小为0的边缘情况,默认孤儿大小为0。[do3cc]

trans-unit.source: Another way to instaniate a batch is like this:
trans-unit.target: 另一种灌注一批的方法是这样的。

trans-unit.source: Batch navigation in templates
trans-unit.target: 模板中的批量导航

trans-unit.source: Batching facilities used in Plone.
trans-unit.target: Plone中使用的配料设施。

trans-unit.source: Both elements can be defined and accessed in Python code AND pagetemplates.
trans-unit.target: 这两个元素都可以在Python代码和pagetemplates中定义和访问。

trans-unit.source: Bug fixes:
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。

trans-unit.source: CSS class to
trans-unit.target: CSS类

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 变更日志

trans-unit.source: Do not show batch navigation for single page with orphan. [maurits] (#9)
trans-unit.target: 不显示单页孤儿的批量导航。[maurits](#9)

trans-unit.source: Factored out Plone batching implementation to seperate egg (PLIP #12235) [tom_gross]
trans-unit.target: 剔除了Plone批处理的实现,以分离鸡蛋(PLIP #12235)[tom_gross]。

trans-unit.source: Fix issue where a start >= end will always return last item. https://dev.plone.org/ticket/13880[thepjot]
trans-unit.target: Fix issue where a start >= end will always return last item. https://dev.plone.org/ticket/13880[thepjot]

trans-unit.source: Fix issue with orphaning [do3cc]
trans-unit.target: 修正孤儿问题[do3cc]

trans-unit.source: Fix issue with sequences when the reported length was different than len() iteration would return the full unbatched sequence. [alecm]
trans-unit.target: 修正当报告的序列长度与len()不同时,迭代会返回完整的未编组序列的问题。[ALECM]

trans-unit.source: Fix lastpage computation with orphaning [gbastien]
trans-unit.target: 修正lastpage计算中的孤儿问题 [gbastien]。

trans-unit.source: Fix multiple_pages if the length of the sequence is exactly the page length. [gaudenz]
trans-unit.target: 如果序列的长度正好是页面长度,则修复multiple_pages。[gaudenz]

trans-unit.source: Fix navlist different in Python2 and Python 3 (Refs. #21) [ale-rt]
trans-unit.target: 修正Python2和Python3中不同的导航列表 (Refs.#21)[ale-rt]

trans-unit.source: Fixed missing test in released package. [thet]
trans-unit.target: 修正了发布包中缺少的测试。[thet]

trans-unit.source: Fixed wrong msgid for ‘First item’. [vincentfretin]
trans-unit.target: Fixed wrong msgid for ‘First item’. [vincentfretin]

trans-unit.source: Fixes:
trans-unit.target: 修复。

trans-unit.source: For backwards compatibility plone.batching provides a drop in metal macro navigation in the batch_macros template. Add it to the template like this:
trans-unit.target: For backwards compatibility plone.batching provides a drop in metal macro navigation in the batch_macros template. Add it to the template like this:

trans-unit.source: For big sequences there is another base class provided by the package: QuantumBatch. This batch generates quantum leaps for quicker navigation.
trans-unit.target: For big sequences there is another base class provided by the package: QuantumBatch. This batch generates quantum leaps for quicker navigation.

trans-unit.source: For the navigation you add the following snippet to your template:
trans-unit.target: 对于导航,您可以在您的模板中添加以下片段。

trans-unit.source: For the use of batching features in Page Templates plone.batching the first thing you have to do is to create a sequence batch and put it in a template variable named batch. You should do this in a view class if possible:
trans-unit.target: For the use of batching features in Page Templates plone.batching the first thing you have to do is to create a sequence batch and put it in a template variable named batch. You should do this in a view class if possible:

trans-unit.source: Incompatibilities
trans-unit.target: 不相容性

trans-unit.source: Introduce a “omit_params” option for the
trans-unit.target: Introduce a “omit_params” option for the

trans-unit.source: It is possible to navigate the batch stored in the two attributes leapback and leapforward with 5 clicks.
trans-unit.target: It is possible to navigate the batch stored in the two attributes leapback and leapforward with 5 clicks.

trans-unit.source: It originated from the the PloneBatch module written for Plone which in itself has been based on Zope2’s ZTUtils.Batch.
trans-unit.target: It originated from the the PloneBatch module written for Plone which in itself has been based on Zope2’s ZTUtils.Batch.

trans-unit.source: Make ellipses stylable and provide more CSS hooks to pagination markup. [davilima6]
trans-unit.target: 让省略号可以样式化,并为分页标记提供更多的CSS钩子。[davilima6]

trans-unit.source: Make ellipses stylable and provide more CSS hooks to pagination markup. This also deprecates the CSS class
trans-unit.target: 使省略号成为可样式化,并为分页标记提供更多的CSS钩子。这也使CSS类的

trans-unit.source: Make sure pagenumber value is not bigger that numpages or it fails in previous_pages when using orphan [gbastien]
trans-unit.target: 确保 pagenumber 的值不大于 numpages,否则当使用孤儿 [gbastien]时,在 previous_pages 中会失败。

trans-unit.source: Minor packaging updates. (#1)
trans-unit.target: 小幅更新包装。(#1)

trans-unit.source: New features:
trans-unit.target: 新特点:

trans-unit.source: New:
trans-unit.target: 新的。

trans-unit.source: Nothing changed yet.
trans-unit.target: 还没有什么变化。

trans-unit.source: Now you can use this in the template of your view.
trans-unit.target: 现在你可以在你的视图模板中使用这个。

trans-unit.source: One thing you have to keep in mind is to call the batch view with a batch as the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 你要记住的一点是,调用批处理视图时要以批处理作为第一个参数。

trans-unit.source: PEP 8, UTF 8 headers, docs cleanup. [thet]
trans-unit.target: PEP 8,UTF 8标题,文档清理。[thet]

trans-unit.source: Pagination: made label and arrows easier to customise. [iham]
trans-unit.target: 分页:使标签和箭头更容易定制。[iham]

trans-unit.source: Plone.batching comes with a customizable batch View batchnavigation with the view class BatchView. The view comes with a template. All you have to do, if you want to customize it, is to override the make_link-method. This method should return a string with the link to the given pagenumber. Here is an example from the folder_contents implementation in plone.app.content:
trans-unit.target: Plone.batching comes with a customizable batch View batchnavigation with the view class BatchView. The view comes with a template. All you have to do, if you want to customize it, is to override the make_link-method. This method should return a string with the link to the given pagenumber. Here is an example from the folder_contents implementation in plone.app.content:

trans-unit.source: Python 3 fixes. [thet]
trans-unit.target: Python 3修复。[thet]

trans-unit.source: Refactor batchnavigation HTML layout to use nav/ul/li elements instead of div/span. [davilima6]
trans-unit.target: 重构batchnavigation的HTML布局,使用nav/ul/li元素而不是div/span。[davilima6]

trans-unit.source: Switches deprecated
trans-unit.target: 废弃的开关

trans-unit.source: This generates 5 subbatches with 15 items from the sequence [0, 1, …, 99] and one subbatch with the last 25 items (including 10 orphaned items). For a detailed description of available parameters for a batch look at the API of the BaseBatch class.
trans-unit.target: This generates 5 subbatches with 15 items from the sequence [0, 1, …, 99] and one subbatch with the last 25 items (including 10 orphaned items). For a detailed description of available parameters for a batch look at the API of the BaseBatch class.

trans-unit.source: This package includes facilities for creating a batched sequence.
trans-unit.target: 该包包括创建批量序列的设施。

trans-unit.source: This results in 6 batches with 15 items and one batch with the last 10 items. This way of creating a batch is meant as a short cut and does not support all the options the canonical constructor supports.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致6个批次的15个项目和一个批次的最后10个项目。这种创建批次的方式是一种捷径,不支持规范构造函数所支持的所有选项。

trans-unit.source: Upgrade Warning! If you customized the batchnavigation.pt file or use specific CSS styles for it, you might have to update them to reflect the new HTML structure.
trans-unit.target: 升级警告! 如果你定制了 batchnavigation.pt 文件或使用了特定的 CSS 样式,你可能需要更新它们来反映新的 HTML 结构。
